price: (Ohun ni) àwọn Ọgbà ìdẹ̀ra gbére tí àwọn odò ń ṣàn ní ìsàlẹ̀ rẹ̀. Olùṣegbére ni wọ́n nínú rẹ̀. Ìyẹn sì ni ẹ̀san fún ẹnikẹ́ni tí ó bá ṣàfọ̀mọ́ (iṣẹ́ rẹ̀).”
arabic: جَنَّٰتُ عَدۡنٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: jannātu ʿadnin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā wadhālika jazāu man tazakkā
